pkgmetadata.longdescription: LibIndic Utilities==================.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/libindic-utils.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/libindic-utils :alt: PyPI VersionThis package provides common functions needed by LibIndic web applicationitself and modules which are hosted by `LibIndic`_. There are 2 submodulesprovided by this package* charmap - provides character mapping for Indic and other languages* langdetect - module provides language detecting capabilities* Also provides a decorator servicemethod, this should be used by modules which want to expose their methods via JSONRPC modulesInstallation------------Python 3 is required.
